projects.title: React Quiz App
projects.description: Quiz application built using React. The application is built on a single page using variuos components. Presently the quiz is built upon anime shows.

projects.title: Web Scraping Tool
projects.description: Built on Python. This tool can be used to get information about any Movie or TV show from IMDB. It can be used to get info about movies & shows available on IMDB.

projects.title: Creatives Website
projects.description: A platform for Designers and Volunteers of Bhumi to share and collabroate their work. A designer can upload a design which can be used by the volunteers.
